about_the_game:
Need some intricate, difficult, and face-melting metal to reflect the feel of your game—you’ve come to the right place: the Chiptune Metal Music Pack! This pack provides 22 background tracks displaying a wide range of metal and rock with a chiptune sound.

■ Engaging Different Styles of Metal
This pack explores a variety of genres from heavy to death, from visual kei to speed—all styles are captured in beautiful chiptune timbres.

■ Tracks for Various Situations
Included are a title and ending track, as well as ten level and boss themes of varying tempi and moods. There are even three music sound effects included!

■ Give Your Game a High Energy Soundtrack!
Each track is designed to keep the head bumping while appropriately supporting the mood of most RPGs!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【music (22 files, all are loop-able)】

・Title Theme
・10 Level Themes
・10 Boss Themes
・Ending Theme


【MSE (3 files)】

・Good MSE
・Bad MSE
・Victory Fanfare

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
